content.raw:
Pretty straightforward, but I don't know how to fix this:

mark@mark-work-laptop:~$ ./update.sh 
[sudo] password for mark: 
Hit:1 http://archive.canonical.com/ubuntu cosmic InRelease
Hit:2 https://download.sublimetext.com apt/stable/ InRelease                   
Hit:3 http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu cosmic InRelease                     
Get:4 http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu cosmic-updates InRelease [83.2 kB]   
Get:5 http://security.ubuntu.com/ubuntu cosmic-security InRelease [83.2 kB]    
Hit:6 http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu cosmic-backports InRelease           
Ign:7 http://packages.osrfoundation.org/gazebo/ubuntu-stable cosmic InRelease  
Err:8 http://packages.osrfoundation.org/gazebo/ubuntu-stable cosmic Release
  404  Not Found [IP: 54.176.9.38 80]
Reading package lists... Done
E: The repository 'http://packages.osrfoundation.org/gazebo/ubuntu-stable cosmic Release' does not have a Release file.
N: Updating from such a repository can't be done securely, and is therefore disabled by default.
N: See apt-secure(8) manpage for repository creation and user configuration details.
mark@mark-work-laptop:~$ 


E:The repository 'http://packages.osrfoundation.org/gazebo/ubuntu-stable cosmic Release' does not have a Release file.

This kills my installation's ability to utilize apt update...

Thanks for your help!
content.html:
Pretty straightforward, but I don't know how to fix this:

mark@mark-work-laptop:~$ ./update.sh [sudo] password for mark: Hit:1 http://archive.canonical.com/ubuntu cosmic InRelease Hit:2 https://download.sublimetext.com apt/stable/ InRelease
Hit:3 http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu cosmic InRelease
Get:4 http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu cosmic-updates InRelease [83.2 kB]
Get:5 http://security.ubuntu.com/ubuntu cosmic-security InRelease [83.2 kB]
Hit:6 http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu cosmic-backports InRelease
Ign:7 http://packages.osrfoundation.org/gazebo/ubuntu-stable cosmic InRelease
Err:8 http://packages.osrfoundation.org/gazebo/ubuntu-stable cosmic Release 404 Not Found [IP: 54.176.9.38 80] Reading package lists... Done E: The repository 'http://packages.osrfoundation.org/gazebo/ubuntu-stable cosmic Release' does not have a Release file. N: Updating from such a repository can't be done securely, and is therefore disabled by default. N: See apt-secure(8) manpage for repository creation and user configuration details. mark@mark-work-laptop:~$

E:The repository 'http://packages.osrfoundation.org/gazebo/ubuntu-stable cosmic Release' does not have a Release file.

This kills my installation's ability to utilize apt update...

Thanks for your help!
